amendment.description: An amendment numbered 59 printed in the Congressional Record to exclude anything in section 2 from being construed as an impact to the authority of the President or Secretary of Energy to initiate a drawdown of petroleum products from the Reserve in order to lower gas prices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Magaziner amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 222 (Roll no. 65).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Magaziner.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Magaziner amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 222 (Roll no. 65).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
